ygData.subject: Genetic Art release #2 with "Ken's God Mode"
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! Ken asked me to add a mode where the evolver could alter the weights of the individual connections. I had a go at it and it turned out to be really easy.

Subject: Genetic Art release #2 with "Ken's God Mode"
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=29390171
X-Yahoo-Profile: mattias_fagerlund

Hi!

Ken asked me to add a mode where the evolver could alter the weights of
the individual connections. I had a go at it and it turned out to be
really easy. So I'd like to announce a new release of my genetic art
program - now you can evaluate what each and every connection does in the
network

Right click on images to zoom and or enter "Ken's God Mode".

Oh, it also uses progressive rendering which gives faster feedback, which
is good for us in the MTV generation....

http://www.CambrianLabs.com/Mattias/DelphiNEAT/Files/GeneticArt.zip

cheers,
mattias
